verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Wonderful name of Jesus, Greater than all my sins. How shall my tongue describe Him? Where shall His praise begin? Taking away my burden, Setting my spirit free; To the wonderful name of Jesus, praises be!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Wonderful name of Jesus, Reaching to all the lost! By Him I have been pardoned, Saved to the uttermost. Chains have been torn asunder, Giving me liberty, For the wonderful name of Jesus reaches me.{/lang-eng}
